Queries.Name: mssql_process_status
Queries.Query: SELECT status, COUNT(*) count FROM sys.sysprocesses GROUP BY status
Queries.Description: Counts the number of processes per status

Queries.Name: mssql_deadlocks
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters where counter_name = 'Number of Deadlocks/sec' AND instance_name = '_Total'
Queries.Description: Number of lock requests per second that resulted in a deadlock since last restart

Queries.Name: mssql_userconnections
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name ='User Connections'
Queries.Description: Counts the number of users currently connected to SQL Server

Queries.Name: mssql_batchrequestpersecond
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name ='Batch Requests/sec'
Queries.Description: Number of Transact-SQL command batches received per second

Queries.Name: mssql_PLE
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name ='Page life expectancy' AND object_name LIKE '%buffer manager%'
Queries.Description: Indicates the minimum number of seconds a page will stay in the buffer pool on this node without references.

Queries.Name: mssql_blockedprocesses
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name ='Processes blocked'
Queries.Description: Number of currently blocked processes

Queries.Name: mssql_buffercacheitration
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name ='Buffer cache hit ratio'
Queries.Description: Indicates the percentage of pages found in the buffer cache without having to read from disk

Queries.Name: mssql_pagereadspersecond
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name ='Page reads/sec'
Queries.Description: Indicates the number of physical database page reads that are issued per second

Queries.Name: mssql_pagewritespersecond
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters WHERE counter_name ='Page writes/sec'
Queries.Description: Indicates the number of physical database page writes that are issued per second.

Queries.Name: mssql_logspaceused
Queries.Query: select cntr_value from sys.dm_os_performance_counters where Object_name = 'SQLServer:Databases'  and counter_name = 'Percent Log Used'   and instance_name NOT IN ('_Total', 'mssqlsystemresource') order by   cntr_value desc'
Queries.Description: Percentage of space in the log that is in use

Queries.Name: mssql_totalmemoryKB
Queries.Query: select cntr_value from sys.dm_os_performance_counters where Object_name = 'SQLServer:Memory Manager' and counter_name = 'Total Server Memory (KB)'
Queries.Description: Specifies the amount of memory the server has committed using the memory manager.

Queries.Name: mssql_targtmemoryKB
Queries.Query: select cntr_value from sys.dm_os_performance_counters where Object_name = 'SQLServer:Memory Manager' and counter_name = 'Target Server Memory (KB)'
Queries.Description: Indicates the ideal amount of memory the server can consume.

Queries.Name: mssql_targtmemoryKB
Queries.Query: select cntr_value from sys.dm_os_performance_counters where Object_name = 'SQLServer:Memory Manager' and counter_name = 'Target Server Memory (KB)'
Queries.Description: Indicates the ideal amount of memory the server can consume.

Queries.Name: mssql_transactions
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters where counter_name = 'Transactions/sec' AND instance_name = '_Total'
Queries.Description: Transactions/sec

Queries.Name: mssql_kill_connection_errors
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters where counter_name = 'Errors/sec' AND instance_name = 'Kill Connection Errors'
Queries.Description: Number of kill connection errors/sec since last restart

Queries.Name: mssql_page_fault_count
Queries.Query: SELECT page_fault_count from sys.dm_os_process_memory
Queries.Description: Number of page faults since last restart

Queries.Name: mssql_memory_utilization_percentage
Queries.Query: SELECT memory_utilization_percentage from sys.dm_os_process_memory
Queries.Description: Number of page faults since last restart

Queries.Name: mssql_total_physical_memory_kb
Queries.Query: SELECT total_physical_memory_kb from sys.dm_os_sys_memory
Queries.Description: Total physical memory in KB

Queries.Name: mssql_available_physical_memory_kb
Queries.Query: SELECT available_physical_memory_kb from sys.dm_os_sys_memory
Queries.Description: Available physical memory in KB

Queries.Name: mssql_total_page_file_kb
Queries.Query: SELECT total_page_file_kb from sys.dm_os_sys_memory
Queries.Description: Total page file in KB

Queries.Name: mssql_available_page_file_kb
Queries.Query: SELECT available_page_file_kb from sys.dm_os_sys_memory
Queries.Description: Available page file in KB

Queries.Name: mssql_connections
Queries.Query: SELECT DB_NAME(sP.dbid) db_name,COUNT(sP.spid) count FROM sys.sysprocesses sP GROUP BY DB_NAME(sP.dbid)
Queries.Description: Number of active connections

Queries.Name: mssql_user_errors
Queries.Query: SELECT cntr_value FROM sys.dm_os_performance_counters where counter_name = 'Errors/sec' AND instance_name = 'User Errors'
Queries.Description: Number of user errors/sec since last restart

Queries.Name: mssql_io_read_stall
Queries.Query: SELECT cast(DB_Name(a.database_id) as varchar) as name,max(io_stall_read_ms) as readIO FROM sys.dm_io_virtual_file_stats(null, null) a INNER JOIN sys.master_files b ON a.database_id = b.database_id and a.file_id = b.file_id group by a.database_id
Queries.Description: Wait time (ms) of stall since last restart

Queries.Name: mssql_io_write_stall
Queries.Query: SELECT cast(DB_Name(a.database_id) as varchar) as name,max(io_stall_write_ms) as writeIO FROM sys.dm_io_virtual_file_stats(null, null) a INNER JOIN sys.master_files b ON a.database_id = b.database_id and a.file_id = b.file_id group by a.database_id
Queries.Description: Wait time (ms) of stall since last restart

Queries.Name: mssql_io_queued_read_stall
Queries.Query: SELECT cast(DB_Name(a.database_id) as varchar) as name,max(io_stall_queued_read_ms) as readQueuedIO FROM sys.dm_io_virtual_file_stats(null, null) a INNER JOIN sys.master_files b ON a.database_id = b.database_id and a.file_id = b.file_id group by a.database_id
Queries.Description: Wait time (ms) of stall since last restart

Queries.Name: mssql_io_queued_read_stall
Queries.Query: SELECT cast(DB_Name(a.database_id) as varchar) as name,max(io_stall_queued_write_ms) as writeQueuedIO FROM sys.dm_io_virtual_file_stats(null, null) a INNER JOIN sys.master_files b ON a.database_id = b.database_id and a.file_id = b.file_id group by a.database_id
Queries.Description: Wait time (ms) of stall since last restart

Queries.Name: mssql_io_stall_total
Queries.Query: SELECT cast(DB_Name(a.database_id) as varchar) as name,max(io_stall) as totalStall FROM sys.dm_io_virtual_file_stats(null, null) a INNER JOIN sys.master_files b ON a.database_id = b.database_id and a.file_id = b.file_id group by a.database_id
Queries.Description: Wait time (ms) of stall since last restart

Queries.Name: mssql_system_info
Queries.Query: SELECT SERVERPROPERTY('MachineName') AS MachineName , SERVERPROPERTY('ServerName') AS ServerName , SERVERPROPERTY('Edition') AS Edition , SERVERPROPERTY('Collation') AS Collation , SERVERPROPERTY('InstanceDefaultDataPath') AS InstanceDefaultDataPath , SERVERPROPERTY('InstanceDefaultLogPath') AS InstanceDefaultLogPath , SERVERPROPERTY('ProductVersion') AS ProductVersion , 1 AS Value
Queries.Description: Software Information about the SQL Instance
